name: Punchlime
tag_list: accelerator, business, startup, entrepreneurs, funding, venture-capital, strategic-consultancy, business-process-optimization
overview:
Founded in 2012 by four ex-Googlers, serial investors and entrepreneurs, we are Growth Stage Investors and Accelerators.

We specialize in assisting Internet based businesses to internationalize either from Europe to the U.S. or from the U.S. into the European market.

Through our unique “reverse due diligence” model, we engage in intense, hands on acceleration. By doing so, we get to know your team and your product very well so that we can confidently invest, firstly by deferring part of our acceleration fees, and then by investing in your company.

While we don’t want to run your business for you, we help you to build a more customer-centric organisation by providing all kinds of assistance such as Digital Marketing and SEO, Brand Development expertise, Tech Integration and Localization, Coaching, Funding and Entrepreneurial skills through our highly talented team that will ensure optimization of your business process. In certain cases we even provide interim management team members to increase the rapid roll out of your business internationally.
